story_teamplasma_02_08000/2401_1001_0100: You’re gonna fuse Zekrom and Kyurem?!
story_teamplasma_02_08000/2401_1001_0700:
Impossible! There’s supposed to be only one left
of the ancient dragon Pokémon!
story_teamplasma_02_08000/2401_1001_0800: I didn’t think it’d be possible either at first...
story_teamplasma_02_08000/2401_1001_0900:
But there’s no such thing as impossible. There’s so
many mysteries we don’t yet know about Pokémon
and this world.
story_teamplasma_02_08000/2401_1001_1000: And there’s nothing wrong with having two.
story_teamplasma_02_08000/2401_1001_1100: There were two heroes in Unova, also!
story_teamplasma_02_08000/2401_1001_1200: N! I trust you with my Kyurem!
story_teamplasma_02_08000/2401_1001_1400:
Understood. You’ve entrusted me with your
feelings and your precious partner...
story_teamplasma_02_08000/2401_1001_1500: I’ll be sure to take care of them both!
